meanings: (회복하다) recover (from), get well, be cured, get over, (상처 등이) heal (up)

vlive.korean: 이게 빨리 낫는 게 아니래요 척추가. The spine doesn't heal very quickly. 듣기 View video V PICK! HOW-TO : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 에이프릴 나은 ’예쁜게 죄’ 커버 메이크업 (HOW TO DO April Naeun ‘Oh my mistake’ Cover Makeup)
vlive.english: The spine doesn't heal very quickly.

vlive.korean: 빨리 낫는 게 중요하니까요. It's important to recover. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN]도겸이 왔어요~😁
정말 안 나아요. 제가 빨리 낫는 편인데... It's not easy. I usually get better really fast. 듣기 View video TWICE : 개인브이
vlive.english: It's not easy. I usually get better really fast.

vlive.korean: 차라리 노가다가 낫는 장사인지 싶다. I sometimes think that being a construction worker might be better. 듣기 View video 아이돌 드라마 공작단 (Idol Drama Operation Team) : [드라마 6화] 소미와 소희 재영입! 위기돌파의 카드가 될까?
vlive.english: I sometimes think that being a construction worker might be better.

vlive.korean: [구석으로 찾아가 보지만 말을 걸 수가 없다] 낫는 것 같아요. 아팠는데 괜찮아졌어. [Sitting in the corner] It's getting better. It's fine now. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [REPLAY] MONSTA X-RAY (몬스타엑스레이) _ 5화
vlive.english: [Sitting in the corner] It's getting better. It's fine now.

examples.korean: That cut is taking a long time to heal. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 (베인) 상처는 낫는 데 오랜 시간이 걸릴 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That cut is taking a long time to heal. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His injuries will take a long time to heal. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 부상은 낫는 데 오랜 시간이 걸릴 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His injuries will take a long time to heal. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a tenacious illness 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오래 가는[잘 안 낫는] 병 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a tenacious illness Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a stubborn cough/stain 듣기 Add to Wordbook 잘 안 낫는[고질적인] 기침/잘 안 없어지는 얼룩 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: It took me more than a month to get over my cold. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 감기가 낫는 데 한 달 이상 걸렸다. Neungyule
examples.english: It took me more than a month to get over my cold. Add to Wordbook
